events.name: Tampa Bay Buccaneers at Buffalo Bills

headlines.description: — Low energy wasn’t going to be an issue for the slow-starting Buffalo Bills on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Josh Allen gets Bills off to fast start in 24-18 win over Buccaneers

events.name: Los Angeles Rams at Dallas Cowboys

headlines.description: — Dak Prescott didn't lean on his defense quite so much this time.
headlines.shortLinkText: Prescott throws 4 TDs, Bland gets 3rd pick-6 of season as Cowboys rout Rams 43-20

events.name: Minnesota Vikings at Green Bay Packers

headlines.description: — Kirk Cousins led the Minnesota Vikings back to relevance after their poor start to the season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cousins throws 2 TD passes before leaving with injury in Vikings' 24-10 victory over Packers

headlines.description: — The butterflies Tennessee Titans rookie quarterback Will Levis felt over the past two weeks disappeared Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rookie Will Levis throws 4 TDs in his NFL debut as Titans beat Falcons 28-23

events.name: New Orleans Saints at Indianapolis Colts

headlines.description: — Derek Carr spent the past week answering questions about his sideline demeanor.
headlines.shortLinkText: Derek Carr rebounds from a tough week as the Saints beat the Colts 38-27

events.name: New England Patriots at Miami Dolphins

headlines.description: — Tua Tagovailoa has never lost to New England coach Bill Belichick.
headlines.shortLinkText: Tua Tagovailoa throws for 3 TDs, Jalen Ramsey shines in debut for Dolphins, who beat Patriots 31-17

events.name: New York Jets at New York Giants

headlines.description: — For nearly 60 minutes, Zach Wilson and the New York Jets looked miserable on offense.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jets stun Giants late and earn ugly 13-10 overtime win on Zuerlein's field goal

headlines.description: — The Jacksonville Jaguars believe they can take their brand of football anywhere. Regardless of the continent. Regardless of the weather. Regardless of the opponent.
headlines.shortLinkText: Streaking Jaguars slug their way to 20-10 win over Pittsburgh as Steelers lose QB Pickett to injury

headlines.description: — Walking gingerly back to the huddle after an early run, it was clear Jalen Hurts was hampered by his
headlines.shortLinkText: Hurts throws for 4 TDs on injured knee to help the Eagles beat the Commanders and improve to 7-1

headlines.description: — Bryce Young has heard the criticism, the suggestion that Carolina made the wrong choice by taking him No. 1 overall instead of C.J. Stroud, who has put up big numbers for Houston.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bryce Young beats C.J. Stroud as Panthers claim first victory of season over Texans 15-13

headlines.description: — Jamal Adams used his head to give Geno Smith the chance at some late heroics that helped vault the Seattle Seahawks into first place in the NFC West.
headlines.shortLinkText: Geno Smith throws late TD pass to Jaxon Smith-Njigba, Seahawks top Browns 24-20

events.name: Kansas City Chiefs at Denver Broncos

headlines.description: — Justin Simmons never paid much attention to the Broncos' long losing streak to the Kansas City Chiefs or the way Patrick Mahomes had owned them ever since winning in Denver in his first NFL start back in 2017.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wilson, Simmons lead Denver Broncos to first win over Chiefs since 2015 with a 24-9 thrashing

headlines.description: — Baltimore gave up a touchdown right out of the gate and two more in the fourth quarter.
headlines.shortLinkText: Gus Edwards runs for 3 touchdowns, Ravens' defense keys 31-24 win over Cardinals

headlines.description: — Joe Burrow set the tone early when he ducked out of two sack attempts, scrambled away and converted a third-down pass that extended a game-opening touchdown drive for Cincinnati.
headlines.shortLinkText: Burrow throws 3 TD passes to lead the Bengals past the 49ers 31-17

events.name: Chicago Bears at Los Angeles Chargers

headlines.description: — Leading up to Sunday night, Brandon Staley was looking for his Los Angeles Chargers to have a game where they could put all three phases together.
headlines.shortLinkText: Herbert throws for 3 touchdowns, Chargers get back on track with 30-13 victory over Bears

events.name: Las Vegas Raiders at Detroit Lions

headlines.description: — The Detroit Lions can trace their turnaround to hitting more than missing in the draft.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lions lean on Jahmyr Gibbs' legs, Jared Goff's arm in 26-14 win over offensively challenged Raiders
